title: ContextMenuEvent
description: Metadata collected from a contextmenu DOM event, sent from C-S-S isolated to the native layer.

selectedText.description: The current window text selection, or null if nothing is selected.

linkUrl.description: The href of the closest anchor ancestor, or null if the target is not inside a link.

imageSrc.description: The src of the target element if it is a media element (img, video, etc.), or null.

imageAlt.description: The alt attribute of the target element, or null.

title.description: The title attribute from the target or its closest ancestor with a title, or null.

elementTag.description: The lower-cased tag name of the element that was right-clicked.
